bibl.title: "Papers Presented at the Fourteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 2003. Historica, Biblica, Ascetica et Hagiographica"

bibl.seg: Satoshi Toda, Vie de S. Macaire l'Égyptien: Premier bilan de la recherche.

F. Young, M. Edwards & P. Parvis (edd.), Papers Presented at the Fourteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 2003. Historica, Biblica, Ascetica et Hagiographica = Studia Patristica. 39 (Leuven, 2006) pp. 447-453, 1 tabl.

A paru également en japonais dans: Eikôn. Studies in Eastern Christianity 27 (2003) pp. 68-81. - Complément à: Satoshi Toda, La Vie de S. Macaire l'Égyptien. État de la question, AnalBoll 118 (2000) pp. 267-290, 1 tabl.
